name: Remembrance (Generatoror)
description:
An old sailor returns to the place he was born.

Game was made for weekly game jam week 194 but was not completed in time, may update in the future.
The game has an ending, to activate it simply go as far from the start as possible.

move with arrow keys interact with E

Important credits i had forgotten to add:

Bones in the Ocean - The longest Johns cover by Bone Golem
